item.title: Hacker News Top Stories: Wednesday, December 18, 2024 at 11:15 PM UTC
item.description:
1. Solaar is a Linux manager for many Logitech keyboards, mice, and other devices (130 points | 65 comments)
2. Cultural Evolution of Cooperation Among LLM Agents (189 points | 93 comments)
3. ISO 8583: The language of credit cards (142 points | 22 comments)
4. Show HN: K8s Cleaner – Roomba for Kubernetes (38 points | 21 comments)
5. Windshield pitting incidents in Washington reach fever pitch on April 15, 1954 (2003) (189 points | 126 comments)
6. Launch HN: Innate (YC F24) – Home robots as easy to program as AI agents (92 points | 55 comments)
7. Java in the Small (140 points | 81 comments)
8. Apple Watch with Android (65 points | 29 comments)
9. "The Custer Wolf is Dead." (1921) [pdf] (20 points | 1 comment)
10. Corvus Robotics (YC S18) is hiring a Head of Software to help inventory drones ( | hide)
11. The unbearable slowness of being: Why do we live at 10 bits/s? (220 points | 259 comments)
12. Updates to H-1B (194 points | 523 comments)
13. Formally Modeling Dreidel, the Sequel (62 points | 19 comments)
14. CDC confirms first severe human case of bird flu in U.S. (75 points | 16 comments)
15. Silver amulet is the oldest evidence of Christianity north of the Alps (236 points | 209 comments)
16. On-silicon real-time AI compute governance from Nvidia, Intel, EQTY Labs (18 points | 13 comments)
17. Apple collaborates with Nvidia to research faster LLM performance (17 points | 5 comments)
18. BlackSheep: Fast ASGI web framework for Python (27 points | 14 comments)
19. GitHub Copilot is now available for free (358 points | 170 comments)
20. Optimizing Ruby's JSON, Part 1 (227 points | 54 comments)
21. Kong in Concert (2004) (6 points | 1 comment)
22. Moon (2785 points | 233 comments)
23. CDC confirms first case of bird flu in US (12 points | 3 comments)
24. Crashing rockets and recovering data from damaged flash chips (41 points | 13 comments)
25. Show HN: Musoq – Query Anything with SQL Syntax (Git, C#, CSV, Can DBC) (13 points | discuss)
26. Early Bronze Age Butchered Human Remains from Charterhouse Warren, Somerset, UK (18 points | 8 comments)
27. Harvard Is Releasing a Free AI Training Dataset (28 points | 3 comments)
28. 1-800-ChatGPT (277 points | 243 comments)
29. What is metformin's secret sauce? (67 points | 51 comments)
30. Show HN: ImPlot3D – A 3D Plotting Library for Dear ImGui (151 points | 39 comments)
